summary: In its construction projects, the Army Corps of Engineers may sometimes cause environmental damage. Its flood control efforts may, for example, harm fish populations. Corps project plans must include how it will reduce environmental damage. It must also report its progress in doing so. We found: The Corps didn't deliver required annual reports on the status of these projects to Congress after FY 2020 Corps...
title: Corps of Engineers: The Status of Construction Project Environmental Mitigation Has Not Been Reported and Tracked as Required
